text: @DonaldJTrumpJr Because Covid-19 was never "so deadly", Mr. Trump. They can only thrive on one crisis and all the drama they can milk from it at a time. After the riots it will be something else, you know. Maybe the "murder" hornets will come back...🙏✌🇺🇸
